name: Unbrakeable
description:
You are in charge of a truck that will forever speed up.  You do have access to the truck's "Jake Brake", which slows you down at the risk of overheating your engine.

Try to survive as long as you can with careful piloting and management of your heat meter.  Drive and achieve a high score!

PC Controls:

  • Left/Right or W/D - Steer Left / Steer Right
  • Up/Down or W/S - Jake Brake / Speed Up
  • Mouse - Control menu options

This was a prototype created for a Computer Graphics course.  If there is enough interest, I may continue work to on developing the concept.
